headline: What’s the No. 1 killer of Americans?
content: By Jen Christensen, CNNUpdated 1956 GMT (0356 HKT) June 30, 2016  (CNN)The leading causes of death remained the same from the year before: Heart disease is the No. 1 killer, followed by cancer, according to the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, and infant mortality decreased 2.3%. See the latest news and share your comments with CNN Health on Facebook and Twitter.
